history.proof: srun best use: iteres_ult_const_3 unfold: iteres_ult_const_def_0.

ctx: intros A f x n H.
tactic: apply non_dist_chain_ind with (x := x) in H.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable x (possible names are: A, P and p).

original: intros A f x n H. apply non_dist_chain_ind with (x := x) in H. - exists 0. split. ++ apply le_n_S. apply le_0_n. ++ simpl. reflexivity. - exists 0. split. ++ apply le_n_S. apply le_0_n. ++ simpl. reflexivity. - destruct (IHn (iteres A f x (n + p)) H) as [p [Hp1 Hp2]]. exists (S p). split. ++ apply le_S. apply Hp1. ++ simpl. rewrite <- Hp2. reflexivity.
